node.title: Person critically injured in carwash machine in Christchurch
node.description: An investigation is underway after a person was injured in an automated carwash facility in the suburb of Ferrymead today.
node.content:
["An investigation is underway after a person was injured in an automated carwash facility in the suburb of Ferrymead today.", "", "
File pic Photo: 123RF
", "The incident was reported to police just after 10am.", "Police said the person received critical injuries and has been taken to hospital.", "Two ambulances and a rapid response vehicle treated one patient and took the person to Christchurch Hospital.", "It's understood the incident involved a vehicle at the car wash.", "WorkSafe has been advised."]
